channel.title: Server does not get recognized by Status Page
channel.description: Hello, I am currently running my server [4EverScape, it's back :D] and I frequently check the Server Status page to make sure it is being displayed, but for some reason, it is always classified as offline. Can anyone help me fix this? Thanks Justis

item.title: Server does not get recognized by Status Page
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I got it now, thanks [it fixed itself :P]

Read full topic

item.title: Server does not get recognized by Status Page
item.dc:creator: @Spotlight Spotlight
item.description:
@Spotlight wrote:

Be sure if your using no-ip you keep modyfying it and updating the dns on No-ip as sometimes the ip changes etc and it breaks.
